snippet.title: Forgive Me Father - Game Announcement Trailer [Retro FPS]
snippet.description:
Forgive Me Father is a dark retro horror FPS set in a comic book style world inspired by the novels of H.P. Lovecraft. Coming in Early Access October 2021!

As the only one with full senses, you begin a journey in search for answers and relief. How long can you last?

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1590910/Forgive_me_Father/

Follow us:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/1CEntertainment
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/1c-entertainment
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1c_entertainment/

#Retro #FPS
